# Feedback 

We are keen to understand the challenges faced by analytical teams in ONS when complying with good practice. To evaluate the effectiveness of this guidance, we would be grateful if you could fill in [a short survey](https://forms.office.com/e/ya2ZzRbGHM).  

We appreciate your feedback. It will help us to make additional tools and resources on good practice for producing quality analysis.

If you have questions about this guidance or the survey please email ASAP@ons.gov.uk with "analytical QA" in the subject header.
